entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge dropped his voice and proceeded in a sort of low rumble.

entities.name: potters
entities.description: The Potters knew You-Know-Who was after them.

entities.description: Dumbledore, who was of course working tirelessly against You-Know-Who...

entities.name: james and lily
entities.description: James and Lily were advised by Dumbledore to go into hiding.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta was breathless with interest.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick explained the Fidelius Charm.
